name: fruit catching simulator
description:
catch fruits according to each order you receive, but watch out for rotten fruit! features:
  • some super slick roller skates
  • bodacious beats
  • an entire day night cycle (and an overworked employee)
  • 5 different fruits wow!
  • 3 days of fruit catching fun
controls:
  • [A] and [D] to move
  • [P] to pause
by the marmalads!

Jake Nguyen: character artist and animator

Robert Guan: programmer and juicer upper

Ali Kedwaii: programmer and audio-er

Karina Teruya (insta): 2D artist and fruit modeller

Ross Smith: programmer and fruit dropper

a game created for jamulator 2021
